content:
this is a single endpoint from an open api spec document
it has been minified by removing unnecessary kvps
additionally common terms have been abbreviated  operationId: GetRequestDetails path: https://gateway.stackpath.com/waf/v1/stacks/{stack_id}/sites/{site_id}/requests/{request_id}/details content: params
name stackid
desc a stack id or slug
in path
required true
schema
type str
name siteid
desc a site id
in path
required true
schema
type str
name requestid
desc a waf request id
in path
required true
schema
type str
sum get a requests details
desc retrieve more detailed information about a waf request
responses
200
wafgetrequestdetailsresponse
type obj
wafrequestdetails
type obj
props
id
type str
desc the waf requests unique identifier
path
type str
desc the path of the requested url
wafhttpmethod
type str
default methodunspecified
desc http methods of a request

 methodunspecified unspecified http method
  get http get method
  post http post method
  put http put method
  delete http delete method
  head http head method
  patch http patch method
  options http options method
  connect http connect method
  trace http trace method
wafrequestaction
type str
default actionunspecified
desc the actions that the waf takes when a request triggers a waf rule

 actionunspecified the waf performed an unspecified action with the request
  block the waf blocked the request
  allow the waf allowed the request
  captcha the waf presented the user with a captcha
  handshake the waf performed automatic browser validation
  monitor the waf monitored the request but took no action
ruleid
type str
desc the unique id of the waf rule that triggered the action against the waf request
rulename
type str
desc the name of the waf rule triggered by the request
requestdetailsuseragent
type obj
props
fullstring
type str
desc the full user agent string for the waf request
client
type str
desc the name of the requesting client typically the name of the requesting web browser
clientversion
type str
desc the version of the requesting user agents client typically also the version of the requesting web browser
basebrowser
type str
desc the name of the requesting user agents browser
basebrowserversion
type str
desc the version of the requesting user agents browser
os
type str
desc the name of the requesting user agents operating system
device
type str
desc the name of the requesting user agents device
devicetype
type str
desc the type of the requesting user agents device
cpu
type str
desc the name of the requesting user agents cpu
renderingengine
type str
desc the name of the requesting user agents engine
clienttype
type str
desc the type of the requesting user agents client
desc a waf requests useragent related aspects
requestdetailsnetwork
type obj
props
clientip
type str
desc the originating ip address
country
type str
desc the iso 31661 alpha2 code of the country where the request originated from
networkorganization
type obj
props
name
type str
desc the name of organization
subnet
type str
desc the ip bock of the organization
desc the organization that owns the waf requests originating ip address according to a whois lookup
desc a waf requests network related aspects
requesttime
type str
format datetime
desc when the waf request occurred
referenceid
type str
desc the waf requests userfacing identifier

reference ids are displayed to the end user when the waf blocks a request to a site please note that a requests id and reference id are different
contenttype
type str
desc the content type of the waf request
scheme
type str
desc the http scheme of the waf request
httpstatuscode
type str
desc the http status code of the waf request
httpversion
type str
desc the http version of the waf request
responsetime
type str
desc the time it took the waf to process the waf request
requestheaders
type str
desc the http request headers of the waf request
incidentid
type str
desc the id of the of challenge that was generated for the waf request
requestdetailsrequesttype
type str
default api
desc the types of a waf request

 api a waf request to a url designated by waf as an api url
  ajax an ajax waf request
  static a waf request to a static resource
sessionrequestcount
type str
desc the number of waf requests in the session
domain
type str
desc the internal delivery domain used by the cdn and waf to deliver content
requesteddomain
type str
desc the domain requested in the original http request from the end user
querystring
type str
desc the query string of the request
wafrequestresult
type str
default challengerequestresultunspecified
desc the requests end result

 challengerequestresultunspecified the result is undetermined
  passed the request is passed to origin
  blocked the request is blocked by waf
traffictypes
type str
desc the kinds of traffic in the request flagged by the waf
patternmatchedtags
type arr
requestdetailspatternmatchedtag
type obj
props
tag
type str
desc the tags name
displayname
type str
desc the tags humanreadable name
desc
type str
desc the tags description
field
type str
desc the portion of the http request where the matched pattern was found
fieldname
type str
desc the name of the field that contains the matched pattern
patternname
type str
desc the name of the pattern that triggered the tag
patternvalue
type str
desc the pattern found in the field that triggered the tag
executionphase
type str
desc the waf request/response phase for applying the advanced rule
desc specific facets of a waf request that triggered an action
desc specific facets of a waf request that triggered an action
commontags
type arr
requestdetailscommontag
type obj
props
tag
type str
desc the tags name
displayname
type str
desc the tags humanreadable name
desc
type str
desc the tags description
desc general facets of a request captured by the waf
desc general facets of a request captured by the waf
desc a request that was inspected by the waf
desc a response from a request to retrieve all available information about a request to a waf site
title: 20_Requests_GetRequestDetails_108.json
